Unsplasharp

Enum UnsplasharpClient.OrderBy

Namespace
Unsplasharp
Assembly
Unsplasharp.dll

How to sort the data.

public enum UnsplasharpClient.OrderBy

Fields

Latest = 0

Sort the data from the most recent to the oldest.

Oldest = 1

Sort the data from the the oldest to the most recent.

Popular = 2

Sort the data from the most popular to the least.
